name: offline_range_query_update
chinese_name: 范围修改查询问题相关算法及其应用
author: 沈吉滪
complexity: O(n + m * n^(1-1/d)) for d-dimensional space; O(n + m√n) for half-plane queries; O(n + m log min(n, m)) for sequences or tree paths.
summary: This paper presents an offline algorithm for range modification and query problems where the data satisfies dual semigroup properties. The algorithm uses a divide-and-conquer approach on the operation sequence, maintaining a dynamic rooted forest of equivalence classes. It achieves optimal algebraic operation complexity by merging and splitting these classes efficiently during recursion.
